casebody.data:
Case No. 15,392. UNITED STATES v. HORTON. District Court, D. Alabama. Dec. 20, 1867. Civil Rights— Banishment op Negroes.

fit is a violation of the civil rights bill of 1866 (14 Stat. 27) to inflict upon a negro the punishment of banishment from the state.]

1 Cited in 1 Brightly’s Dig. 150, to the point above stated. Nowhere reported: opinion not now accessible. Decided by Busteed, District J udge.] •
